name: Put the Mask on
description:
Put the Mask on!

This game is in active development.

A deadly virus threatens society. But unconscious people don't heed the warnings. They are not wearing masks!

Our protagonist is determined that the recommendations are fulfilled. So put the damn mask on!

Your goal is simple: put the mask on as many people as you can. Be careful, they are all infected and will cough on you.

This game is currently in development.
